EXPERIENCE

Research:



Drone Data Communication System (DDCS)

RattlerAssist provides a way for professors to contact students directly, as well as send out important material such as notes or other subject-related resources. It also allows for the student to communicate with the rest of the class, tutors, and the professor.



Vision and Artificial Intelligence Lab (VAIL)

RattlerAssist provides a way for professors to contact students directly, as well as send out important material such as notes or other subject-related resources. It also allows for the student to communicate with the rest of the class, tutors, and the professor.



Biomedical Engineering: Simulations, Imaging, and Modeling (BME-SIM)

RattlerAssist provides a way for professors to contact students directly, as well as send out important material such as notes or other subject-related resources. It also allows for the student to communicate with the rest of the class, tutors, and the professor. NSF REU Abstract Award



Software Assurance and Security in Emerging Technologies

RattlerAssist provides a way for professors to contact students directly, as well as send out important material such as notes or other subject-related resources. It also allows for the student to communicate with the rest of the class, tutors, and the professor. NSF REU Abstract Award





Conferences:



International Telemetry Conference (ITC 2022)

• Presenting research paper from senior capstone project, lone capstone project (from St. Mary’s) to be submitted and accepted to a national conference.



TAPIA Conference (2022)

• Premier venue to acknowledge, promote and celebrate diversity in computing.



Annual Biomedical Research Confernce for Minority Students (ABRCMS 2021)

• Virual; e-Poster presentation in the Computational and Systems Biology research group.



Biomedical Engineering Society (BMES 2021) Annual Conference

• Virual; e-Poster presentation in the Computational and Systems Biology research group.



St. Mary's University Summer Research Symposium (2021)

• Virual; e-Poster presentation in the Computational and Systems Biology research group.



East Carolina University (ECU 2021) Research Symposium

• Research symposium held at ECU for various REU programs that took place during the summer; presented my research to East Carolina University faculty of various departments (engineering, kinesiology, physical therapy, neuroscience).



Annual Biomedical Research Confernce for Minority Students (ABRCMS 2020)

• Often referred to as ABRCMS, this conference provides networking opportunities with graduate schools across the United States. This conference also provides undergraduates the opportunity to communicate their research in a professional environment.

• Received presentation award for my research in the computational and systems biology group. Link to award



University of North Texas (UNT 2020) Research Symposium

• Research symposium for students awarded to the UNT Software Testing REU program.



St. Mary's University Spring Research Symposium (2020)

• Research symposium for undergraduate students conducting research during the spring 2020 academic semester.







Scholarships and Awards



This is particularly useful for both the tutors and the students because it removes the need for an exchange of personal information and centralizes the mode of communication between the students and the tutor for that particular class.





Non-Academic Work:


Glass Dawg Driver

One of few qualified drivers for a private windshield repair company located in San Antonio, TX. Plan and coordinate trips across the city to pickup and deliver consumer vehicles. Consumers included personal customers, Enterprise, as well as various car dealerships throughout the city.

CAVA Trainer

RattlerAssist provides a safe learning experience for the students as they are able to ask their peers for assistance when they may be too nervous or do not want to bother their professor with smaller questions about the course.

Chipotle Trainer

RattlerAssist provides a safe learning experience for the students as they are able to ask their peers for assistance when they may be too nervous or do not want to bother their professor with smaller questions about the course.

McDonald's Trainer

RattlerAssist provides a safe learning experience for the students as they are able to ask their peers for assistance when they may be too nervous or do not want to bother their professor with smaller questions about the course.

Sports Official

• Includes time-management and positive collaboration with students, parents, and coaches to ensure safety of all participants. Communication skills are heavily required as the official has the authority on the field, this often includes deescalating messy situations.• Managing official sports games that range in level from elementary to high school to premier clubs in the following sports: baseball, soccer, and basketball. .
